\CL Black clouds that cover the heavens...

\CL The dark clouds that were floating on
the distant horizon during the day had
gradually covered the sky above me.

\CL The light rain starts to fall, drop by
drop.
createFilter 回想ノイズ oldfilm 0
Line
illustration_01a

It was just at that moment when a girl
dressed in mourning clothes was crying
in front of a gravestone.

...It has been over half a day since the
funeral was over.
The girl's parents have passed away.

Unable to accept that fact, she
continued to cry.

That was the girl's best resistance she
could offer right now.
illustration_01b

The girl slowly turned on her heels, her
green eyes that had lost their light.
She bit her lip tightly.
And then,
Young Man: It's sad, isn't it?

And then, a young man approached and
muttered softly.
illustration_01c

Young Man: The sadness of losing someone
you love...

Upon hearing those words, the girl
slowly lifted her face.
Complete stranger. Not a familiar face.

However, there was no mocking or
scornful emotion in it.

So, these are words to encourage the
girl, I suppose.
The girl took it that way.

Young Man: Please rest assured. We are
family.
The young man let out a brief smile.

With a lonely expression, she wore a
fragile smile like glass.

The young man who claimed to be a
stargazer god took the girl's hand.
GWFade picture 83 fadeOut 232 20 5
eraseFilter 回想ノイズ
This is the beginning.

This is the beginning of a story woven
by a girl called an angel and the gods.
